titleHead: Contact DWP - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Contact DWP before you appeal
requestingMandatoryReconsideration: You can only appeal after you’ve asked DWP to reconsider their decision. This is known as requesting 'mandatory reconsideration'.
contactDetailsFromLettersOrEmails: You can find their contact details on any letters or emails you’ve received from them.
linkUCJournal: You can do this in your Universal Credit online journal (opens in a new window).
